companies_research.name: Perplexity AI
companies_research.reason: Perplexity AI, cofounded by Aravind Srinivas, Johnny Ho, Denis Yarats, and Andy Konwinski in 2022, is gaining traction for using AI models to answer users' questions. It focuses on high-value professional users with a $750 million cloud deal with Microsoft and significant backing from investors like Jeff Bezos.

companies_research.name: Ramp
companies_research.reason: Ramp is a financial operations platform aiming to save businesses time and money. Known for its corporate credit cards offering cash back and its use in AI for transaction review, it has reached a $32 billion valuation, demonstrating rapid growth and underlying profitability.

companies_research.name: Cohere Health
companies_research.reason: Cohere Health is recognized for its clinical AI solutions, ranking No. 218 on the Deloitte Fast 500 and is known for transforming healthcare utilization management. It raised $90 million in its Series C to expand its AI platform, highlighted by its inclusion on TIME's World's Top HealthTech Companies list.
